Just unRAR, mount (or burn) the ISO and then execute "Setup.exe".

IMPORTANT PLEASE READ!!!

In order to work properly (save files) always run the game as Administrator (this
is a side-effect of the patch). Or install the game in a non-Windows protected path
(aka outside of "Program Files") for example "C:My GamesFinal Fantasy VIII".

There is a bug when using a control for playing, a screen with the button
configuration appears before the main menu and cannot be skipped using the control
buttons, you need to press the Ã¢â‚¬Å“XÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ on your keyboard to skip it.

Misc Notes:                                                
                                                               
This is a repack of the Steam release of Final Fantasy VIII (Ver. 1.0.1.0).

It includes some fixes for a better playing experience:

1.- Better music (closely similar to the one in the original PSX release). For even
    higher quality music and customization please install the "Roses And Wine 2013" mod:

2.- Better FMVs (the ones from the original PC release).
3.- Better sounds and music (less compressed) for the FMVs (ripped from the original.
    PSX release).
